item.title: Monster Lobsta
item.dc:creator: justincox
item.description:
This is actually the second time I’ve eaten at Monsta Lobsta and both times I went with the standard lobster roll. The roll is 4 oz of lobster meat mixed with a bunch of delicious filler. Some people with us were surprised the roll was cold, but I don’t think being cold takes anything away […]

The post Monster Lobsta appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
item.content:encoded:
This is actually the second time I’ve eaten at Monsta Lobsta and both times I went with the standard lobster roll. The roll is 4 oz of lobster meat mixed with a bunch of delicious filler. Some people with us were surprised the roll was cold, but I don’t think being cold takes anything away from the flavor. The bun is toasted and very good.

The total package is very good and, despite being the most expensive truck I’ve eaten at, is well worth the cost. Not pictured, Carla tried the lobster lasagna which was a special. Based on her report, she wouldn’t let me have any, it was delicious.

You can find Monsta Lobsta on Twitter.

The post Monster Lobsta appeared first on Chow Down Orlando.
